name: punchcards
description: Punchcard visualization using TypeScript and D3.js

scripts.purge: npm run clean & trash bower_components/ typings/ node_modules/
scripts.copy-site-deps: cp bower_components/crossfilter/crossfilter.min.js bower_components/moment/min/moment.min.js bower_components/d3/d3.min.js site/js && cp src/css/punchcards/*.css bower_components/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css site/css
scripts.presite: trash site/js/ && mkdirp site/js && trash site/css/ && mkdirp site/css && npm run copy-site-deps
scripts.site: npm run tslint && npm run tsc && npm run dist && npm run test && cp dist/punchcards.js site/js/

author: Johan Hidding, Mateusz Kuzak, Jurriaan H. Spaaks, Lourens Veen, Faruk Diblen
